name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Skilled Full-Stack Software Engineer with expertise in **Java**, **J2EE**, and database design, specializing in web application development. Proficient in both back-end development with **Java** and **Spring Boot**, and front-end development using **React**, **Vue**, and **Angular**. Experienced in Agile methodologies and the software development lifecycle (SDLC), ensuring effective change control and quality assurance in project execution. Demonstrated ability in architectural design and implementing security measures aligned with **OWASP** standards. Proven track record of cross-functional collaboration and client support, with a focus on delivering scalable, reliable, and user-centric applications in healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Java** (Spring Boot) to design a microservices-based Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS), achieving **95%** accuracy in patient tracking while enhancing adherence rates through automated reminders.
Developed **RESTful APIs** with **Spring Data JPA**, improving data accuracy by **40%** and ensuring secure EHR integration leveraging **Spring Security** and **OAuth2**.
Enhanced user interface and experience for the pathway builder using **React** and **Ant Design**, leading to a **30%** reduction in completion time.
Implemented a dynamic notification system using **RabbitMQ**, achieving **99%** timely alert delivery.
Established and maintained CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, reducing deployment times by **80%**.
Containerized microservices utilizing **Docker**, streamlining deployment processes across staging and production environments.
Managed cloud services with **AWS EKS** (Kubernetes) and **Terraform**, ensuring **99.9%** uptime and optimizing load handling through **Redis** caching.
Engaged in **Agile methodologies** for seamless project execution and cross-functional collaboration, demonstrating strong skills in **requirements gathering** and **architectural design**.

• Developed backend services utilizing **Java** (Spring Boot) and **Node.js**, achieving a **25% reduction** in response times for ticketing and customer support.
• Implemented a notification system with **Kafka** for real-time alerts, resulting in a **98% timely notification rate** for critical issues.
• Created a customer insights dashboard using **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, enhancing resolution rates by **20%**.
• Automated testing and deployment processes with **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a reliable and consistent release workflow.
• Deployed the platform on **AWS EC2** using **Docker** and **Terraform**, decreasing infrastructure setup time by **50%**.
• Applied Agile methodologies and SDLC principles throughout development, ensuring high-quality outcomes and effective collaboration.
• Designed and implemented database schemas maintaining adherence to security measures as per **OWASP** standards.

• Developed backend REST APIs utilizing **Java (Spring Boot)**, implementing **J2EE** standards and achieving **98%** uptime.
• Designed robust database structures using **PostgreSQL**, streamlining **database design** processes.
• Elevated frontend performance through **Angular**, improving load times by **40%** through optimization techniques like code splitting and lazy loading.
• Executed comprehensive testing initiatives with **JUnit** and **Mockito**, diminishing bug occurrences by **30%** and enhancing **quality assurance**.
• Deployed web applications globally leveraging **AWS CloudFront** and **S3** for efficient low-latency data access, reinforcing collaboration across cross-functional teams.
• Led development projects within **Agile methodologies** and standard **SDLC** processes, with successful documentation of change control mechanisms.
• Adhered to security best practices and **OWASP** guidelines during the architectural design phase, ensuring compliance with security measures.
